description: Demonstrates fire_signal - fires a signal to wake up waiting cascades. Run signal_consumer_demo first, then run this to fire the signal.

phases.name: simulate_work
phases.instructions:
Simulate completing some upstream work (like an ETL pipeline).

Describe the work being done:
- Extracting data from source
- Transforming records
- Loading to destination

When done, proceed to fire the signal to notify waiting cascades.

phases.name: fire_completion_signal
phases.instructions:
The upstream work is complete! Now fire the 'data_ready' signal to wake up any waiting cascades.

Use the fire_signal tool with:
- signal_name: 'data_ready'
- payload: {"table": "analytics.events", "row_count": 150000, "status": "complete"}

This will wake up any cascades waiting on this signal.

phases.name: complete
